title: Topic 001 Question 098
body: Your company acquired a healthcare startup and must retain its customers' medical information for up to 4 more years, depending on when it was created. Your corporate policy is to securely retain this data, and then delete it as soon as regulations allow.
options: Store the data in Google Drive and manually delete records as they expire.
Anonymize the data using the Cloud Data Loss Prevention API and store it indefinitely.
Store the data in Cloud Storage and use lifecycle management to delete files when they expire.
Store the data in Cloud Storage and run a nightly batch script that deletes all expired data.
